items: 3 red, 3 blue, 3 yellow dye (Random for everyone)
Nettle Tea (Leather gloves, Tinderbox, Logs, Bowl of water, Bucket of milk)
req.name: Items

1.step: Equip leather gloves and pick nettles.
1.subtitle: Getting started

description: Equip leather gloves and pick nettles.

2.step: Use the nettles on the bowl of water.

description: Use the nettles on the bowl of water.

3.step: Use the logs on the tinderbox.

description: Use the logs on the tinderbox.

4.step: Use the nettle-water on the fire.

description: Use the nettle-water on the fire.
If you fail cooking the nettle, pick as many nettles as you can.
Go to the house east of Edgeville and fill the bowl with water.
Use the nettles on the bowl of water.
Use the nettle-water on the stove. Continue doing this until you successfully cook the nettle

5.step: Use the bucket of milk on the nettle tea.

description: Use the bucket of milk on the nettle tea.

6.step: Go upstairs and use the bones on the loader.
6.subtitle: Ecto-tokens

description: Go upstairs.
Use the bones on the loader.

7.step: Climb down the trapdoor and use the buckets on the slime pool.

description: Climb down the trapdoor and follow the path all the way down.
Use the buckets on the slime pool.
Worship the Ectofuntus.

9.step: Talk to the Ghost disciple to redeem the ecto-tokens.

description: Talk to the Ghost disciple to redeem the ecto-tokens.
Pass the energy barrier
Talk to Velorina.

12.step: Equip ghostpeak amulet and talk to Necrovarus.

description: Equip ghostpeak amulet and talk to Necrovarus.
Talk to Velorina.
Talk to the Old crone.

15.step: Use the porcelain cup on the nettle tea.

description: Use the porcelain cup on the nettle tea.
Talk to the Old crone.
Click on the ship to repair it with a silk and thread.

18.step: Climb to the top of the ship.
18.subtitle: Treasure map

description: Climb up the ladders from the ground floor.
Climb up the ladders from the second floor.

19.step: When the wind speed drops low search the mast to find out what colours the components of the flag are.

description: When the wind speed drops low search the mast to find out what colours the components of the flag are. (Random for everyone).
As you search the mast, it will tell you what color the each part of the ship.
Use the correct color dye on the correct part of the ship. Do this three times for all three parts of the ship. Mix the dyes to get the correct colors.
Red + Yellow = Orange
Red + Blue = Purple
Blue + Yellow = Green
Talk to the Old man.

21.step: Use the chest key on the chest for a map scrap.

description: Use the chest key on the chest for a map scrap.

22.step: Cross the gangplank and jump along the path of the rocks.

description: Cross the gangplank and jump along the path of the rocks.
Jump-To the rocks.
Jump-To the rocks.
Jump-To the rocks.
Jump-To the rocks.
Jump-To the rocks.

23.step: Open and search the chest for a map scrap.

description: Open and search the chest for a map scrap.

24.step: Attempt and search the chest (ground floor).

description: Attempt and search the chest
Defeat the scorpion
Search the chest again.

27.step: Combine the map pieces to get a treasure map.

description: Combine the map pieces to get a treasure map.

28.step: Right-click and choose the 'Travel' option on the Ghost captain.
28.subtitle: Treasure!

description: Right-click and choose the 'Travel' option on the Ghost captain.

29.step: Dig at this exact spot (shown below).

description: Dig at this exact spot
Talk to Ak-Haranu.

31.step: Talk to Robin and beat him playing Runedraw four times. (Chat 1)

description: Talk to Robin and beat him playing Runedraw four times.
Keep rolling on the left hand side until you win. Win four times and he will sign the oak longbow. (First win).
Second win
Third win
Fourth win
Talk to Ak-Haranu.

33.step: Trade a Trader Crewmember for a bucket of slime.
33.subtitle: The robes

description: Trade a Trader Crewmember for a bucket of slime.
Talk to the ghost innkeeper.

35.step: Use the bucket of slime on the bedsheet.

description: Use the bucket of slime on the bedsheet.
Talk to Gravingas.

37.step: Equip the bedsheet and alternate asking two ghost villagers for 10 signatures.

description: Equip the bedsheet and alternate asking two ghost villagers for 10 signatures. Ignore them if they ask for ecto-tokens.
Continue talking back and forth until you get all 10 signatures.
After 10 signatures, talk to Gravingas.

39.step: Talk to Necrovarus and pick-up the bone key he drops.

description: Talk to Necrovarus and pick-up the bone key he drops.
Pick-up the bone key he drops.

40.step: Use the bone key and open the door.

description: Climb up the staircase.
Use the bone key and open the door.

41.step: Open and search the coffin for mystical robes.

description: Open and search the coffin for mystical robes.
Talk to the Crone.
Talk to Necrovarus.
Talk to Velorina.
